content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water (system 4797) and steam (system 4795)
- Part of electrical network id 8474

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Copper Mining and Smelting at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Collection chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates
- Output inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 1 at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Collection chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates
- Output inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) containing copper plates
- Input inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport
- Additional furnace at (14.0, 14.0)

### Research Lab System
Multiple labs connected to electricity network 8474, currently missing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with science pack extraction
- Ensure automation science packs are being produced and transported to the correct output chest before attempting extraction
- Verify the assembling machine has all required ingredients (iron gear wheels and copper plates)

### Resource shortage errors
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Keep coal supply maintained for burner devices
- Monitor and replenish copper plate and iron gear wheel supplies for science pack production

### Production flow issues
- Ensure proper connection between production stages
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in all burner devices
- Keep input materials flowing to assembling machines

### Entity placement and connection issues
- Verify all machines are properly connected via inserters and belts
- Ensure power network connections are maintained
- Keep transport systems (belts, inserters) properly fueled and operational
